recommendations.recommendation: It`s a slow paced anime, but the story is good and the characters are diverse and interesting. I do recommend watching it and being patient. Watching a batch of episodes in a row instead of one per week might be the best experience. I definitely expect the score to go up with time.

A smart, confident and quietly inventive take on standard shounen fare. It avoids a lot of the most annoying tropes of the genre. One of the smartest but also gutsiest choices the author of the manga made was to give it a deliberately slow pace. In the wrong hands that could have been disastrous but Ashihara Daisuke uses this to circumvent the necessity for boring filler material and the treading-water symptoms that often plague other manga/ animes that are intended to have long runs (I`m looking at you Naruto!). He also uses the slow pace to build both his world and the characters with such abundant breadth that it feels like he will never run out of interesting things for his heroes to do. So, while it does build slowly and takes its time this is a supremely smooth and confident ride shaping up here. By all means, give it a whirl!

anime.description: A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth`s only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back! Source ANN

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: swordplay
tag.description: The act or art of using a sword or similar weapon skillfully.

tag.name: super power
tag.description: Be it an ancient Greek Heracles, a cybernetic muscle-man, or a fourteen year-old girl in a mini-skirted sailor suit. As long as they have super powers, they`re in the show.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: science fiction
tag.description: Science fiction stories usually focus on how situations could be different in the future when we are more technologically advanced; due to either our own achievements or having met with other civilizations whom we have learned from.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: strong male lead
tag.description: The lead male protagonist in this anime shows backbone, is competent, and does not shy away from seemingly insurmountable objectives.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Rindou Youtarou
character.description: Youtarou Rindou is a resident of Border`s Tamakoma Branch. Youtarou is not shy, often does things he`s not supposed to, and is prone to outbursts. He is puerile, though, as he believes Raijinmaru is a dog. Youtarou possesses a large amount of Trion, enough to trigger a Side Effect. (Source: World Trigger Wikia) Youtaro is a little kid with messy black hair framing his face. He usually wears a red hoodie with black sleeves, black pants and white shoes. He also wears a helmet with goggles, made for him by Reiji. Youtaro is not shy, and more often than not does things he`s not supposed to, and is prone to outbursts. He is puerile, though, as he believes Raijinmaru to be a dog. He is frequently getting into fights, for which reason Kizaki created a helmet for him, to protect him from himself He`s the son of Rindou Takumi and owner of the Capybara Raijinmaru.

episode.title: A級5位・嵐山隊の木虎藍
Ai Kitora, A-Rank No.5 Agent
Ai Kitora, agent de l’unité Arashiyama, nº 5 de la classe A
A-kyuu 5-i: Arashiyama Tai no Kitora Ai
episode.summary: Osamu gets more trouble than credit when he claims to have defeated Trion Soldier Marmod. Really, he’s covering for the Neighbor, Yuma. Kitora, an A-rank Border Agent, is furious with Osamu for stepping out of line… But does she suspect the truth? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三雲修の実力
Osamu Mikumo`s Ability
Les capacités d`Osamu Mikumo
Mikumo Osamu no Jitsuryoku
episode.summary: Combat-use Trion Soldiers attack when a gate opens in Osamu’s school just outside of the Forbidden Zone. Worried he’s not strong enough, Yuma tries to stop Osamu from fighting back, but Osamu’s determination to save the other students is limitless. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 近界民[ネイバー]とトリオン兵
Neighbor and Trion Soldier
Les Neighbors et les Soldats-Trions
Neighbor to Trion Hei
episode.summary: Border sees the Neighbor Yuma as an enemy… but Osamu is unable to view him as someone with hostile intentions, and trust begins to bloom between the two boys. Osamu finds himself caught between his own thoughts and the rules of the organization he belongs to, Border. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界からの訪問者
Visitor from the Other World
Les visiteurs venus d`un autre monde
Isekai kara no Raihousha
episode.summary: Approximately four years ago, a gate to another world opened in Mikado City, and invaders called Neighbors appeared. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 実力派エリート・迅悠一
Power Elite, Yuichi Jin
La crème de l’élite, Yûichi Jin
Jitsuryokuha Elite: Jin Yuuichi
episode.summary: Kitora boldly jumps onto the back of Ilgar, a new type of Trion Soldier, while it’s mid-flight and bent on attacking the city below. Suddenly, Ilgar transforms, enters self-destruct mode and plummets toward its target. How will she escape now?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雨取千佳のサイドエフェクト
Chika Amatori`s Side Effect
Le Side Effect de Chika Amatori
Amatori Chika no Side Effect
episode.summary: Yuichi and Osamu`s critical mission to investigate the abnormal gate puts a lot of pressure on Osamu. Meanwhile, Yuma follows Replica’s advice and conducts an investigation of his own. The next morning, Osamu and Yuichi have a fateful meeting with Yuma... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブラックトリガー
The Black Trigger
Le Black Trigger
Black Trigger
episode.summary: Shuji and Yosuke are soon joined by two snipers and they wage a four on one battle against Yuma. Osamu seeks help from Yuichi for the human-form Neighbor but is told to stand down. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三輪隊の強襲
Miwa Squad`s Assault
L’assaut de l’unité Miwa
Miwa Tai no Kyoushuu
episode.summary: Osamu reaches out to Yuma and Replica. He and Chika learn some critical information about Neighbors from Yuma, but they`re soon discovered by two A-Rank agents, Shuji and Yosuke; they`re searching for a Neighbor in human form... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 玉狛のA級隊員
A-Rank Agents of Tamakoma
La classe A de la Tamakoma
Tamakoma no A-kyuu Taiin
episode.summary: Osamu, Yuma and Chika set their sights on joining the expeditionary force. First, they`ll need to win a tournament called the Rank Wars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: それぞれの決意
Each One`s Determination
Leurs choix respectifs
Sorezore no Ketsui
episode.summary: Yuma`s revealed why he came from the other world. Chika`s resolved to join the Border Agency so she can go to the other world in search of her friend and her older brother. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 玉狛支部
Tamakoma Branch
La branche Tamakoma
Tamakoma Shibu
episode.summary: Yuma is invited to join the Border Agency’s Tamakoma Branch, and agrees on the condition that Osamu and Chika join with him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボーダーという組織
The Organization Known as Border
L`agence nommée Border
Border to Iu Soshiki
episode.summary: With Shuji`s squad singlehandedly defeated, the Border Agency`s executives order Yuichi to defeat Yuma and recover the Black Trigger. Osamu worries about Yuichi`s impending clash, while a secret hidden by Yuma is slowly exposed. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボーダートップチーム
Border`s Top Teams
Les troupes d`élite du Border
Border Top Team
episode.summary: Yuichi and Yuma join forces...while Commander Masamune begins to fear the power gathering in the Tamakoma Branch. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 動き出す未来
The Future Moves Forward
Le futur en mouvement
Ugokidasu Mirai
episode.summary: Yuichi Jin and the Arashiyama Unit repel the enemy. Receiving news of their elite squad`s defeat, the Border Agency`s headquarters starts to get nervous. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ブラックトリガー・風刃
Black Trigger, Fujin
Fûjin, le Black Trigger
Black Trigger, Fuujin
episode.summary: Yuichi finally reveals his "Wind Blade" technique with the Black Trigger. As his battle with A-Rank vets Kei and Soya reaches its climax, the Arashiyama Unit shows up in support and clashes with the Miwa Unit. Who will emerge victorious?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: NO.1アタッカー・太刀川慶
No.1 Attacker, Kei Tachikawa
L’attacker nº 1, Kei Tachikawa
No.1 Attacker Tachikawa Kei
episode.summary: The battle between the A-Rank attack unit and Yuichi Jin begins to rage. In the face of top-level agents, Yuichi tries to turn it into a test of endurance. But just as Shiro Kikuchihara gets by him, Yuichi`s Black Trigger goes off! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! 遊真VS緑川
Duel! Yuma vs. Midorikawa
Duel ! Yûma vs Midorikawa
Gekitotsu! Yuuma VS Midorikawa
episode.summary: Yuma and Shun Midorikawa`s fight begins. Yuma quietly rages over Shun`s humiliating public defeat of Osamu. How will he fight against the A-rank vet? Meanwhile, Commander Kido convenes a meeting to prepare for the forecast massive Neighbor invasion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ランク戦! 緑川駿の策略
Rank War, Shun Midorikawa`s Plot
Matchs de classe ! Le stratagème de Shun Midorikawa
Rank-sen! Midorikawa Shun no Sakuryaku
episode.summary: Osamu doesn`t know how to deal with his new reputation as "the guy who tied with Soya Kazama". He is soon challenged by one of his fellow agents to a Rank War. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三雲修 VS 風間蒼也
Osamu Mikumo vs. Soya Kazama
Sôya Kazama vs Osamu Mikumo
Mikumo Osamu VS Kazama Souya
episode.summary: Osamu readies for his practice fight against Soya Kazama. Soya is a symbol of overwhelming strength, while Osamu has yet to land a hit in over twenty battles! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボーダー正式入隊
Border Official Enlistment
L’enrôlement au Border
Border Seishiki Nyuutai
episode.summary: The day of Yuma and Chika`s initiation into the Border Agency arrives. Osamu nervously stands by in support, while they draw the scrutiny of their new peers. At that time, Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 玄界[ミデン]の雛鳥
Meeden`s Baby Birds
Les oisillons de Meeden
Meeden no Hinadori
episode.summary: Trion soldiers from Aftokrator appear all over Mikado City. Border is forced to divide its forces to deal with their numbers. Chika`s C-rank unit is attacked while organizing the civilian evacuation. What is Aftokrator`s true goal? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神の国アフトクラトル
The Holy Land, Aftokrator
Le pays des dieux, Aftokrator
Kami no Kuni Aftokrator
episode.summary: Border seeks a way to counter the new Trion soldier, Rabbit. Yuma prevents Trion soldiers from infiltrating the city, but is mistaken for the enemy and attacked by the B-rank Chano Unit. Meanwhile, an Ilgar Trion Soldier menaces Border headquarters! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大規模侵攻開始
The Large-Scale Invasion Begins
Le début de l`invasion massive
Daikibo Shinkou Kaishi
episode.summary: The Neighbors` large-scale invasion finally begins. The invading army of Trion soldierrs is countered with a defense strategy. Just as the battle seems to turn in Border`s favor, a new Trion soldier, Rabbit, emerges from a defeated Bamster! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 近界民[ネイバー]の世界
The Neighbors` World
Le monde des Neighbors
Neighbor no Sekai
episode.summary: The Border brass puts together a strategy based on Replica`s information about Neighborhood. Meanwhile, Yuichi Jin senses impending danger for Osamu and asks Shuji Miwa for help. A massive battle with the Neighbors is about to begin in Mikado City! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反撃のボーダー
Border on the Counterattack
La contre-attaque du Border
Hangeki no Border
episode.summary: Kizaki, Karauma and Konami fight the sinister Hyuse and Viza so that Osamu and Chika can escape. Meanwhile, Ranbanein easily defeats Chano unit and takes on Yoneya, Izumi, Midorikawa and Azuma`s combined forces. Can Jin`s worst case scenario be prevented? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘! エネドラ VS 風間隊
Fierce Fight! Enedora vs. Kazama Squad
Bataille ! Enedora vs l`unité Kazama
Gekitou! Enedora VS Kazama Tai
episode.summary: Aftokrator`s humanoid Neighbors are unveiled. These so-called Horn Triggers overwhelm the Border agents with powerful Triggers! The A-rank Kazama Unit uses Kikuchihara`s Side Effect in a skillful combo play against Enedora, but will their luck continue? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ボーダー最強の部隊
The Most Powerful Squad in Border
La meilleure unité du Border
Border Saikyou no Butai
episode.summary: The C-rank units are revealed to be the true target. The battle intensifies as Hyrein sends humanoid Neighbors Enedora and Ranbanein into combat. Osamu fights to give the C-ranks a chance to escape, but Rabbit`s merciless attack on Chika continues! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 敵将ハイレイン
The Enemy Captain, Hyrein
Le général ennemi, Hyrein
Tekishou Hyrein
episode.summary: Suwa unit traps Enedora in a virtual training room. Director Shinoda goes to offer them back-up, and the tides begin to turn for Border. Mira`s 7 Rabits block the evacuees led by Osamu, as the Aftokrator leader Hyrein heads out to capture Chika! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の分岐点
A Crossroads of Fate
Le croisement du futur
Unmei no Bunkiten
episode.summary: Viza and Hyuse continue to pursue Chika, but Yuma and Jin arrive just in time. Yuma faces off against Viza while Jin battles Hyuse. Osamu and Karasuma lead Chika and the C-rank agents to Border HQ. However, Enedora`s rampage has the HQ in chaos! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星の杖[オルガノン]の使い手
Organon User
L`utilisateur d`Organon
Organon no Tsukaite
episode.summary: Kizaki has figured out Hyuse`s Trigger, Lambiris. He orders Karasuma and Konami to protect the city while he holds off Hyuse and Viza. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘決着! 最強の戦い
A Fierce Showdown! The Fight of the Best
Fin du combat acharné ! La bataille la plus violente
Gekitou Kecchaku! Saikyou no Tatakai
episode.summary: Skillfully using Red Bullet, a Trigger for advanced users, Miwa proves himself the equal of Hyrein. Facing defeat at the hands of Viza`s Organon, Yuma recalls what his father taught him. Taking Osamu`s words to heart, he commits to a risky plan! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハイレインの恐怖
The Terror of Hyrein
La terreur de Hyrein
Hyrein no Kyoufu
episode.summary: Karasuma uses Geist to buy Osamu enough time to make it to the base with Chika`s cube. While Geist is immensely powerful, it forces a Bail Out within 200 seconds. Can Karasuma change the future predicted by Jin? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 執念のエネドラ
Implacable Enedora
La ténacité d`Enedora
Shuunen no Enedora
episode.summary: Director Shinoda corners Enedora in the virtual training room. However, Enedora`s powerful Black Trigger attack are more than a match for the Border agents` group attacks. Meanwhile, Karasuma faces Hyrein and activates his true power, Geist! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三雲修の覚悟
Osamu Mikumo`s Determination
La détermination d`Osamu Mikumo
Mikumo Osamu no Kakugo
episode.summary: Hyrein`s attack turns Chika into a cube. Osamu blames himself, but is inspired by his fellow Border agents to race for Border HQ in an attempt to save Chika Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 戦いの果てに
The End of the Battle
À la fin de la bataille
Tatakai no Hate ni
episode.summary: Yuma defeats Viza but is low on Trion. Miwa is separated from victory. Osamu is captured by Hyrein within sight of Border HQ. Miwa activates Fujin and fires on Hyrein with Yuma. With 7 seconds to go until the foretold future, can Yuma and Osamu win? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 持たざる者
The Have-Not
Les démunis
Motazaru Mono
episode.summary: Aftokrator retreats, but the wounds of the war are deep. Border struggles to revitalize Mikado City, Yuma searches for the missing Replica, and Osamu remains unconscious. In his dreams, he recalls why he joined Border, and why he seeks to protect Chika. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 始動! 三雲隊
Setting Off! Mikumo Squad
Les débuts de l’unité Mikumo
Shidou! Mikumo Tai
episode.summary: The squad puts into action their plan to defeat the more experiences units. Their trump card will be... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 諏訪隊と荒船隊
Suwa Squad and Arafune Squad
Les unités Suwa et Arafune
Suwa Tai to Arafune Tai
episode.summary: Mikumo Squad`s B Rank Competition debut ends in a stunning win. Their next opponents are the 8th ranked Suwa Squad and the 10th ranked all-Sniper Arafune Squad. Osamu tries to come up with a Tamakoma-support strategy, but can he lead his team to victory? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: B級ランク戦開幕
B-Rank Wars Begin
Coup d’envoi des matchs de classe B
B-kyuu Rank Ikusa Kaimaku
episode.summary: PR Director Netsuki sets up Osamu as a scapegoat for the devastation from the battle. But Osamu speaks from the heart and changes everyone`s mind. Next, Osamu, Yuma and Chika must prepare for the next step towards A Rank: the B Rank Competition! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヒーローと相棒
A Hero and a Partner
Héros et partenaires
Hero to Aibou
episode.summary: Osamu wakes up in the hospital, where his mother and Shiori tell him what happened during his week-long coma. Suddenly, Business Director Karasawa takes Osamu out of the hospital to a press conference about the battle. What are Karasawa`s true intentions? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 悪天候の戦闘
The Battle in the Foul Weather
Bataille par mauvais temps
Akutenkou no Sentou
episode.summary: Round 3 begins in a violent storm. While Mikumo Squad and Kuruma Squad focus on finding each other, Nasu Squad carries out their strategy as planned. Just as Nasu Squad seems to have the advantage, Chika`s Ibis strikes. Can Mikumo Squad grasp victory? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 那須隊の選択
Nasu Squad`s Choice
Le choix de l`unité Nasu
Nasu Tai no Sentaku
episode.summary: After Yuma`s unexpected loss, the team rushes to find a counter for Murakami`s powerful Side Effect. Meanwhile, Kuruma Squad and Nasu Squad make their own preparations for battle as well. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鈴鳴第一の村上鋼
Ko Murakami of Suzunari-1
Kô Murakami de l’équipe Suzunari–1
Suzunari Dai Ichi no Murakami Kou
episode.summary: Mikumo Squad wins Round 2 and is promoted to 8th rank. Their next opponents are the 13th-ranked Nasu Squad and 9th-ranked Kuruma Squad. Yuma requests Individual Rank Competition with Kuruma`s ace Attacker, Ko Murakami. What is Murakami`s secret ability? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 生意気な新人[ルーキー]
An Impertinent Rookie
Le novice effronté
Namaiki na Rookie
episode.summary: Yuma joins Round 2, armed with a new Option Trigger. Meanwhile, Arafune Squad finds itself hounded by Mikumo Squad and Suwa Squad. Arafune goes back to his roots as a former Attacker and uses the Attacker Trigger Kogetsu. What will Osamu and Chika do? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エースの意地
The Ace`s Willpower
L`obstination des Attackers
Ace no Iji
episode.summary: Kuruma Squad`s Murakami and Mikumo Squad`s Kuga clash on the West Bank! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 勝負を決めるもの
The Thing That Decides the Battle
Ce qui détermine la victoire
Shoubu o Kimeru Mono
episode.summary: The team members are divided due to Chika dropping the bridge. While Osamu goes after points on the east side, Yuma faces off against Murakami and Kumatani in a triple-attacker showdown in the west. The stakes are high for all teams. Who will win? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そして明日へ
And Toward the Future
Puis, vers le lendemain
Soshite Ashita e
episode.summary: Mikumo Squad joins the B-rank upper tier. The fight against the top B-rank squads will be a touchstone for promotion to A-rank. Anticipating this, Osamu struggles with his inability to score a single point on his own and comes to a conclusion. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 隊長のプライド
The Captain`s Pride
La fierté d`un capitaine
Taichou no Pride
episode.summary: The B-Rank Competition`s third round finale! Yuma triumphs while the team leaders fight on the east side. Osamu seeks to change the tide of battle by drawing water into the city and pitting Nasu against Kuruma. The three-way battle is about to conclude. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 異世界からの逃亡者
Fugitives from Another World
Les fugitifs d`un autre monde
Isekai kara no Toubousha
episode.summary: Unknown Trion soldiers show up at Border HQ. Jin and Tachikawa take them on. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 姿なき襲撃者
Invisible Assailants
L`assaillant sans forme
Sugata Naki Shuugekisha
episode.summary: Zeno, a refugee from Elgates, begs Yuma and Osamu to harbor Lilith and him during their stay in this world. With Chika taken hostage, Osamu and Yuma have no choice but to agree. As they return to the Shizuka City retreat, an unseen assassin strikes! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼノのトリオン兵
Xeno`s Trion Soldiers
Les Soldats-Trions de Xeno
Xeno no Trion Hei
episode.summary: Kazama Squad heads into combat as Gojima City is attacked by new Trion soldiers. Osamu tries to befriend Zeno and Lilith. Zeno offers to reveal his past, if Osamu will agree to a one-on-one fight. How far will he go to learn the truth about Elgates? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギーヴの攻勢
Giev`s Thrust
L’offensive de Gieve
Giev no Kousei
episode.summary: Zeno`s devotion to Lilith leads him to treat Yuma and Chika like tools, enraging Osamu. Meanwhile, Gieve and Karon threaten Shizuka City with massive Trion soldiers! As Osamu`s team joins Kitora in defending the city, Gieve isolates Osamu and Zeno. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 守るべきもの
The One That Shall Be Saved
Ceux à protéger
Mamorubeki Mono
episode.summary: While studying with Yoneya and Kodera, Miwa sees young siblings and is reminded of his past. The peace is shattered by an attack from Gieve`s Spider-type Trion Soldiers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 玄界[ミデン]の夕陽
The Sunset of Meeden
Le soleil couchant de Meeden
Meeden no Yuuhi
episode.summary: Despite Lilith`s best efforts, she can`t hide her loneliness. Chika and Osamu work with Kitora and Midorikawa to try and cheer her up. At that moment, Karon and Gieve make their move, commanding Trion soldiers with special abilities. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リリスの謎
The Secret of Lilith
Le mystère de Lilith
Lilith no Nazo
episode.summary: Shiori takes Yuma, Osamu, and Chika on a relaxing trip to Shizuka Marine World with Zeno and Lilith. But the peace is interrupted by an attack by Gieve`s powerful Trion soldiers. Lilith`s body reaches its limit and begins to change, revealing her secret. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: デッド・オア・アライブ
Dead or Alive
Dead or alive
Dead or Alive
episode.summary: Arashiyama Squad gathers Border`s aces! Arafune and Murakami join in the battle, destroying Gieve`s Trion soldiers. But Gieve`s plot to blow up Shizuka City using massive Trion soldiers proceeds. As Osamu comes up with a plan, Zeno takes his own action. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 陽太郎の冒険
The Adventure of Yotaro
L’aventure de Yôtarô
Youtarou no Bouken
episode.summary: Yotaro heads towards Shizuka City with Raijinmaru, hoping to catch up to Konami. He meets a troubled young girl named Cocoa and befriends her. As a violent fight between Border agents and Trion soldiers breaks out, Yotaro`s true battle begins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 二つのブラックトリガー
The Two Black Triggers
Les deux Black Triggers
Futatsu no Black Trigger
episode.summary: Zeno and Chika find Osamu, while Yuma continues his fight against Giev. He struggles against Giev and Charon`s skillful coordination, so similar to what he had with Replica. At the same time, a new Trion soldier threatens Osamu, Chika and Xeno. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 囚われの修
The Captured Osamu
Osamu en captivité
Toraware no Osamu
episode.summary: Yuma, Chika and Xeno take the fight to the enemy in order to rescue Osamu. However, a cunning trap separates them, forcing Yuma into a one-on-one fight against Giev. A Trion soldier generates a mysterious virtual world where Yuma faces an unexpected foe. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼノとリリス
Xeno and Lilith
Xeno et Lilith
Xeno to Lilith
episode.summary: Lilith reveals her true power in order to save Xeno and Yuma. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 真実と嘘
Truth and Lies
Vérité et mensonges
Shinjitsu to Uso
episode.summary: Gieve and Charon begin their attack on Yuma. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アフトクラトルの捕虜
The Prisoner from Aftokrator
Le prisonnier d’Aftokrator
Aftokrator no Horyo
episode.summary: Soon after meeting and parting with Xeno and Lilith, Yuma, Osamu and Chika begin preparing for their promotion battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 反転する未来
A Reversed Future
Le futur qui s’inverse
Hanten Suru Mirai
episode.summary: Xeno`s hand cuts thin air, and monster Gieve takes in Lilith and takes on a grotesque form. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギーヴとカロン
Giev and Charon
Gieve et Charon
Gieve to Charon
episode.summary: Giev`s secret is revealed. Just like Lilith, he`s a Humanoid Trion Soldier created by Lamia. Meanwhile, all of Shizuka City`s citizens become Charon`s hostages. Tachikawa, Kazama and other A-Rank Border agents gather in Shizuka City for the coming battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狙われる玉狛
The Targeted Tamakoma
La Tamakoma prise pour cible
Nerawareru Tamakoma
episode.summary: Ninomiya Squad, Kageura Squad, Azuma Squad and Mikumo Squad face off! As tensions mount, each team targets Osamu and closes in. Meanwhile, the two strongest B-Rank agents, Ninomiya and Kageura, assess the situation. Can Mikumo Squad survive the onslaught? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: B級上位戦
The Battle of the B-Rank Top Teams
Match de classe en 1re poule
B-kyuu Jouisen
episode.summary: During their brief encounter, Yuma senses Kageura`s limitless skill. Osamu receives shooter training from Arashiyama and Izumi, allowing him to truly contribute to the team. If they win, Mikumo Squad`s promotion to A-Rank could become a reality. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 研ぎ澄まされた牙
Sharpened Fangs
Les crocs aiguisés
Togisumasareta Kiba
episode.summary: Tamakoma-2 starts individual training in preparation for the B-Rank rank wars. Osamu visits Arashiyama for shooter training. Chika meets a young boy during group sniper training. Yuma meets Kageura, an agent that No. 4 attacker Murakami has never beaten. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: No.1シューター二宮匡貴
No.1 Shooter, Masataka Ninomiya
Le shooter nº 1, Masataka Ninomiya
No. 1 Shooter Ninomiya Masataka
episode.summary: Aftokrator`s Black Trigger user, Enedora, is alive! Enedora sheds new light on the Large Scale Invasion and the reason that Chika was targeted. Meanwhile, B-Rank No. 1 team leader Ninomiya approaches Osamu and Chika. Osamu makes a tough decision. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 進化する三雲隊
An Evolving Mikumo Squad
L’unité Mikumo évolue
Shinka Suru Mikumo Tai
episode.summary: After the Rank Wars against the B-Rank upper tier squads, Mikumo Squad tries to up their game. Yuzuru gives Chika an idea for overcoming her weaknesses, and Osamu gathers information about Hyuse, while an A-Rank Team leader tries to headhunt Yuma. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新たなる脅威
A New Threat
Une nouvelle menace
Tanaru Kyoui
episode.summary: Shinoda announces an imminent invasion by a new Neighbor country. Tachikawa and Kazama Squad are assigned to deal with the threat, based on Jin`s predictions. Osamu follows Jin`s suggestion to add a new member to Mikumo Squad. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 隊長の務め
A Captain`s Duty
Le devoir du capitaine
Taichou no Tsutome
episode.summary: Yuma faces Kageura. Ninomiya takes advantage of this to attack them both. After the battle, Osamu is devastated by his defeat. Kazama`s advice leads him to make a major decision for the sake of the team, just as a new threat approaches Mikado City. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バトルロイヤル
A Battle Royal
Mêlée générale
Battle Royal
episode.summary: Osamu is quickly knocked out of combat by Azuma, former leader of an A-Rank No. 1 team. Chika tries to overcome her inability to fire on humans, but her sniping reveals her location. Meanwhile, Yuma enters a battle royale against 5 Attackers. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 未来へ
To the Future
Vers le futur
Mirai e
episode.summary: Osamu continues to try to improve himself, Chika confronts her faults, and Yuma has faith in them. Mikumo Squad`s losses in the B-Rank Rank Wars motivate them further. As a new Neighbor invasion of Border HQ begins, can they open a path to the future? Source: crunchyroll
